description: Try our easy to follow Penne With Chilli Crab & Pangrattato recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Seafood pasta,Pescatarian,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Tree nut free,Seafood,Low sugar,Peanut free
name: Penne With Chilli Crab & Pangrattato Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch flatleaf parsley, leaves removed, roughly chopped
1 lemon, rind finely grated (cut into wedges, to serve)
2 long red chillies, deseeded, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: To make pangrattato, heat 1 tbs oil and butter in a frying pan over medium heat. When butter has melted, add breadcrumbs and half the garlic and cook, stirring often, for 10 minutes or until golden. Transfer to a bowl. Stir through rind.
Meanwhile, cook pasta in a large pan of boiling salted water, according to packet instructions, until just tender. Drain and return to pan.

Heat remaining oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Cook onion, remaining garlic and chilli for 3 minutes or until soft. Add crab and stir until combined. Cook for 2 minutes or until heated through. Add crab mixture to pasta along with parsley and toss to combine. Sprinkle pangrattato over pasta and serve with lemon.
